name: 生態系生態學
comment: Classroom in  B208, BRC, AS.    未定教師 鍾國芳
goals: Understand the movement and transformation of energy and materials into, within, and out of the system.
Understand the key processes that shape the structure and function of an ecosystem.
Discuss how human induced global change affects the ecosystem stability and function.
Identify questions that are important in the field of ecosystem ecology.
Evaluate journal articles in the field of ecosystem ecology.
prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
